001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
008import java.util.function.Supplier;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012/**
013 * A simple service locator for initialization purposes.
014 */
015public sealed interface ServiceRegistry permits DefaultServiceRegistry {
016
017        /**
018         * Creates an empty service registry.
019         * @return registry.
020         */
021        public static ServiceRegistry of() {
022                return new DefaultServiceRegistry();
023        }
024
025        /**
026         * Puts a service.
027         * @param <T> service type.
028         * @param type type.
029         * @param service service instance.
030         * @param name name of service.
031         */
032        public <T> void put(Class<T> type, T service, String name);
033
034        /**
035         * Puts a service.
036         * @param <T> service type.
037         * @param type type.
038         * @param supplier service instance.
039         * @return service.
040         */
041        public <T> T putIfAbsent(Class<T> type, Supplier<T> supplier);
042
043        /**
044         * Puts a service with name "".
045         * @param <T> service type.
046         * @param type type.
047         * @param service service instance.
048         */
049        default <T> void put(Class<T> type, T service) {
050                put(type, service, "");
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * Finds a service or null.
055         * @param <T> service type
056         * @param type service class.
057         * @param name name of service.
058         * @return service or <code>null</code>.
059         */
060        @SuppressWarnings("exports")
061        public <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type, String name);
062
063        /**
064         * Finds a service or null.
065         * @param <T> service type.
066         * @param type service class.
067         * @return service or <code>null</code>.
068         */
069        @SuppressWarnings("exports")
070        default <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type) {
071                return findOrNull(type, "");
072        }
073
074        /**
075         * Finds <strong>all</strong> services of a specific type.
076         * @param <T> service type.
077         * @param type service class.
078         * @return list of services.
079         */
080        public <T> List<T> find(Class<T> type);
081
082}
083
084record ServiceKey(Class<?> type, String name) {
085        ServiceKey {
086                type = Objects.requireNonNull(type);
087                name = Objects.requireNonNull(name);
088        }
089}
090
091interface PluginProvider<T, E extends Exception> {
092
093        public T provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws E;
094
095}
096
097abstract class ProviderRegistry<T extends PluginProvider<U, E>, U, E extends Exception> {
098
099        protected final Map<String, T> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
100
101        public void register(String scheme, T provider) {
102                providers.put(scheme, provider);
103        }
104
105}
106
107final class DefaultServiceRegistry implements ServiceRegistry {
108
109        private final Map<ServiceKey, Object> services = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
110
111        @Override
112        public <T> void put(Class<T> type, T service, String name) {
113                if (service == null) {
114                        throw new NullPointerException("service");
115                }
116                services.getOrDefault(new ServiceKey(type, name), service);
117
118        }
119
120        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
121        @Override
122        public <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type, String name) {
123                if (type == null) {
124                        throw new NullPointerException("type");
125                }
126                if (name == null) {
127                        throw new NullPointerException("name");
128                }
129                return (T) services.get(new ServiceKey(type, name));
130        }
131
132        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
133        @Override
134        public <T> List<T> find(Class<T> type) {
135                return services.entrySet().stream().filter(e -> e.getKey().type() == type).map(e -> (T) e.getValue()).toList();
136        }
137
138        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
139        @Override
140        public <T> T putIfAbsent(Class<T> type, Supplier<T> supplier) {
141                var t = (T) services.computeIfAbsent(new ServiceKey(type, ""), k -> Objects.requireNonNull(supplier.get()));
142                if (t == null) {
143                        throw new NullPointerException("supplier returned null");
144                }
145                return t;
146        }
147
148}
